title: Skims face wrap: Have night-time beauty routines become too extreme?
description: Some people are calling the wrap dystopian, saying Kim Kardashian is tapping into insecurities.
content:
The uglier you look going to sleep, the more beautiful you will look in the morning - that's the mantra of people on TikTok who are taking part in "morning shed" videos.
The trend consists of people swaddled in silicone masks and mouth tape, filming ... [947 chars]

title: Son Heung-min announces departure from Tottenham as he seeks ‘bit of change’ after decade at club
description: Spurs captain reveals intention to leave club this summer, saying it is the ‘most difficult decision’ of his career
content:
The Tottenham captain Son Heung-min has revealed he intends to leave the club this summer after a decade in north London.
The 33-year-old attacker joined the Premier League side from Bayer Leverkusen in 2015 and went on to play more than 450 times fo... [2229 chars]

title: Tech companies are racing to make their products smaller - and much, much thinner
description: There is a growing focus on the miniature market within many consumer-facing tech firms - and it's one that could even call into question the current smartphone dominance.
content:
Some of the world's leading tech companies are betting big on very small innovations.
Last week, Samsung released its Galaxy Z Fold 7 which - when open - has a thickness of just 4.2mm, one of the slimmest folding phones ever to hit the market.
And Ho... [4437 chars]

title: North Korea's opened its doors to Russian tourists. So... how was their holiday?
description: Anastasiya Samsonova was one of the first foreign visitors to North Korea's new seaside resort that was opened to great fanfare by Kim Jong Un.
content:
The world's most secretive state is a mystery for billions of people - but not Anastasiya Samsonova.
She has returned from a week's holiday in North Korea.
"We saw nothing terrible there, there is no danger there," the 33-year-old HR manager tells me... [3922 chars]

title: Trump news at a glance: ‘credibility’ of US economics data at risk, say experts, as president fires labor official
description: Trump’s own former statistics chief denounces move as ‘groundless’ and ‘dangerous’. Key US politics stories from Friday 1 August at a glance
content:
After Donald Trump ordered the firing of a federal government official in charge of labor statistics, experts and opposition politicians have expressed alarm that the “credibility” of US economic data was at risk.
